channel.title: Win Calculations
channel.description:
A couple issues with some win calculations
When Reaper and King are left it gives win to the King. This happened today where MM was executed and the game ended there. I had enough souls to bypass night immunity and reap king before he would get a chance to accuse me.
When Hunter and Evil King are left it gives win to the King. In my opinion this should end in a draw because of the Retribution ability.
Old bug might be fixed in this version but if a scorned target gets executed that causes the game to end the scorned does not get credit

And King can accuse Hunter… and then die from it. In my experience Hunter would win instantly at that point, which I have seen before.
So it has to be a draw since neither can deal with the other.

item.title: Win Calculations
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
XeonZenn:

When Reaper and King are left it gives win to the King.

I’ve seen this happen as well. Reaper had 2 souls, just him and King going into night after an execution. King got win even though there was no way on Earth Reaper could have lost other than falling asleep.

Hunter/Evil King is interesting. It would end up a tie unless Hunter has a wolf, then he could win. Unless the Hunter retribution goes first (and I’m fairly sure it does based on other scenarios where it ended a game). I mean it’s still a draw since the Hunter can’t kill the King, I guess.
